snippet.title: The Golden Eyed Ghosts - Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1950930/The_Golden_Eyed_Ghosts/

Golden Eyed Ghosts is a gothic Metroidvania adventure set in the crumbling Andromeda. As exiled warrior Orion, searching for a way to restore his memories, unravel a terrifying conspiracy and survive a treacherous web of lies, deceit, and horror… Where nothing is as it would seem.
